description.p: Livestream List (Qt) is a PySide6/Qt6 application for monitoring livestreams on Twitch, YouTube, and Kick. Get notified when your favorite streamers go live and launch streams directly in your preferred video player.

ul.li: Monitor Twitch, YouTube, and Kick channels for live status
Desktop notifications when streams go live
Streamlink integration for launching streams in mpv/VLC
Import your followed channels from Twitch
Filter and sort your channel list

description.p: Fix YouTube browser button to open live stream instead of channel page
Fix notifications not appearing (invalid sound hint format)
Fix YouTube stream launching for channels with handles
Fix CI build for Docker-in-Docker environments
Fix Kick channel lookup (upgrade to KDE Platform 6.9), fix test notifications in flatpak
Initial Qt release - migrated from GTK4/Libadwaita to PySide6/Qt6
